ygData.subject: Re: Twinking - my 2cp
ygData.msgSnippet: Well said! It s fun either way...but I agree, stop begging! ;) I heard of a friend that got sick of a begger wanting a teleport...so he teleported him to some
ygData.messageBody:
Well said! It's fun either way...but I agree,
stop begging! ;) I heard of a friend that got sick of
a begger wanting a teleport...so he teleported him
to some REALLY hard zone and then gated
out...hopefully taught the begger a lesson! ;)<br><br>I did want
to say thanks to all the players out there who help
out...even when not asking for it...like when I'm getting
pounded by mobs/trains, they heal me up on their way
through the zone...really nice to see that!
:)<br><br>Take care and happy hunting.<br><br>Jim<br>CoJim,
Druid of the 11th season, Prexus server.
